text:
Wilhelmus Lourens Johannes Suurbier () (16 January 1945 – 12 July 2020) was a Dutch football player and was an assistant coach of the Albanian national team. From 1966 to 1978, he played for the Netherlands national football team. From 1964 to 1977, he played for AFC Ajax.
Suurbier was born in Eindhoven, Netherlands. He died from a cerebral hemorrhage on 12 July 2020 in Amsterdam, aged 75.
